name: Alien Invasion (itch) (botmark)
description:
"Alien Invasion" is a space invaders clone made in Love2D for educational purposes. View the source code at https://github.com/markpwns1/alien-invasion

The libraries used are MiddleClass and SLAM.

CONTROLS: Arrow keys to move, and Z to shoot

INSTRUCTIONS: Destroy as many enemies as possible before being destroyed. Don't let them or your lasers touch you.
